description.en: One day at school, Youta sees someone strange entering his school. Out of nowhere this being appears next to him and makes him fall from the 3rd floor. He lands in a strange world, where beings like dragons exist! Youta meets a young paladin, and discovers that he is the only man inhabiting that planet, and that its inhabitants are extremely 'weak' to his presence. Could this be paradise?
description.pt-br: Em um dia na escola Youta vê alguém estranho entrando na escola, do nada este ser aparece ao seu lado e o joga do 3º andar! Porém ele vai parar em um mundo estranho, onde seres parecidos com dragões existem! Youta conhece uma jovem paladina, e descobre que é o único homem habitando aquele planeta, e que suas habitantes são extremamente ‘fracas’ a sua presença… seria este o paraíso?!

description.en:
Waking up, Kim Hajin finds himself in a familiar world but an unfamiliar body.

A world he created himself and a story he wrote, yet never finished.

He had become his novel’s extra, a filler character with no importance to the story.

The only clue to escaping is to stay close to the main storyline.

However, he soon finds out the world isn’t exactly identical to his creation.

---

**Links:**
- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4mamlw_Z8eo)
description.ko:
"나는 누구지?"

이 세상은 내가 쓴 소설.
그러나 나는 단 한 번도 쓴 적 없는 인물이 되었다.

얼굴은 물음표에다,
소설 속 그 누구와도 접점이 없는,
아무도 기억 못할 그런 인물.

영웅 아카데미에 입학한 엑스트라, 아니 소설 속 먼지가 살아남는 법.

남은 소설 분량까지 버텨야 한다!

altTitles.es-la: La heroína oculta de su Majestad

description.en:
Yeon Lokheun is a girl who grows up living as a boy learning martial and spiritual arts. She heads for the palace in order to clear the name of her father, a wanted criminal, where she meets the young Emperor Garyun. He promises to save her father's life in exchange for her lifelong services. After gaining Garyun's trust, she travels the world solving supernatural-like problems that arise in place of the Emperor. But how long can she continue this life without the others finding out that she is actually a woman?

---
Lokheun’s name means "happy morning," but her life takes a tragic turn when her mother is murdered and her father becomes a fugitive after exacting revenge. To save him, Lokheun devotes her life to Garyun, the dashing emperor who’s committed to right the wrongs of his father. Believing Lokheun to be a boy, Garyun is determined to mold her into an unsurpassed martial artist, even if it means sending her to hell. Their strained relationship turns into something more as Lokheun searches for the one thing she’s never had: a life befitting her name.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%97%B0%EB%A1%9D%ED%9D%94/2621), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=51793959)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/his-majestys-secret-heroine/info)

description.es-la: Yeon Lokheun es una niña que crece viviendo como un niño aprendiendo artes marciales y espirituales. Se dirige al palacio para limpiar el nombre de su padre, un criminal buscado, donde conoce al joven emperador Garyun. Él promete salvar la vida de su padre a cambio de sus servicios de por vida. Después de ganarse la confianza de Garyun, viaja por el mundo resolviendo problemas sobrenaturales que surgen en lugar del Emperador. ¿Pero cuánto tiempo puede continuar esta vida sin que los demás descubran que en realidad es una mujer?

description.en:
Timid and self-conscious high school student Karin never paid much attention to boys until she met Kiriya, a popular student from a nearby boys' school. Karin and Kiriya embark on a romantic journey despite Karin's classmate Yuka's best efforts to sabotage their relationship, but Karin soon learns that living happily ever after isn't on the curriculum when she becomes Kiriya's center of attention, as well as embittered Yuka's bull's-eye on her dartboard of hate.  
  
Included one-shot:  
Volume 10: Kiriya at 13 (Spring)

When playing a virtual reality game called Cang Lan, Xiao Wan gets pushed off a cliff. She ends up in another game world. What will happen to Xiao Wan?

---
**Contents:** 147 (or 410 split chapter parts) (S1) + >197 (S2) = >344 chapters
- **Season 1:** vol. 1 ch. 1-147 (1-147)
- **Season 2:** vol. 2 ch. 1-197+ (148-344+) (ongoing)

**Note:** season 1 chapter 1-114 is in single page format. Starting with season 1 chapter 115, the page format switches to long strip.

description.en:
“Don’t you think it’s stupid to be crazy in love?”

Queen Laetitia was executed on the scaffold. For she had done evil things to make his lover turn her infatuated husband. However, she thought she was dead, but for some reason, she had returned back in time and her second life began.

“I won’t fall in love in this life. I’m going to live a peaceful life by becoming a sober student with glasses!”

I will be taken. After that, for some reason, Camillus' raging love affair began…?!

I’ll somehow survive with these glasses…!!

description.ja:
「恋に狂うって馬鹿みたいだと思わない？」

王妃レティシアは断頭台にて処刑された。恋人に夢中の夫を振り向かせるため悪事を働いたから。しかし死んだと思ったはずが何故か時を遡り、二度目の人生が始まる。「今度の人生では恋なんてしない。ガリ勉地味眼鏡になって平穏に生きていく！」そう誓ったレティシアだけれど、ある日、眼鏡がずれて学園のスーパースター・カミロに素顔を見られてしまう。それからというもの、何故かカミロからの怒涛の溺愛が始まって…！？

なんとかこの眼鏡で生き延びてみせます…！！

---

**Original Web Publication:** [Comic Days](https://comic-days.com/episode/4856001361054105850), [NicoVideo](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/62861), [Pixiv Comic](https://comic.pixiv.net/works/8591)
description.es-la:
¿No crees que es una tontería estar locamente enamorado? 

La reina Leticia fue ejecutada en la guillotina. Había cometido todo tipo de maldades para ganarse a su esposo quien estaba obsesionado con su amante. Creía que estaba muerta, pero de alguna manera viajó en el tiempo y comenzó una segunda vida. "No me enamoraré en esta vida. Voy a ser una chica trabajadora, sobria y con anteojos." Leticia lo juró, pero un día sus anteojos se caen y Camilo, la superestrella del colegio ve su verdadero rostro... entonces, por alguna razón, ¡¿él comienza a encariñarse con ella...?! 

"¡Me las arreglaré para sobrevivir con estos anteojos...!"

---
[Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n0744gz/)

**Original Web Publication:** [Comic Days](https://comic-days.com/episode/4856001361054105850), [NicoVideo](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/62861), [Pixiv Comic](https://comic.pixiv.net/works/8591)
description.pt-br:
Você não acha que é bobagem estar loucamente apaixonado? A rainha Letícia foi executada na guilhotina. Ela havia cometido todo tipo de maldade para conquistar seu marido, que era obcecado por sua amante. Ele pensou que ela estava morta, mas de alguma forma ela viajou no tempo e começou uma segunda vida. "Não vou me apaixonar nessa vida. Serei uma garota trabalhadora de óculos e discreta." Leticia jurou, mas um dia seus óculos caíram e Camilo, o craque da escola, viu sua verdadeira face... então, por algum motivo, ele começou a se apegar a ela...?! "Vou conseguir sobreviver com esses óculos...!"

description.en: Baek Yigang is a son of the Baek Clan, one of the seven great clans of Zhongyuan. Afflicted with the Taiyin Qi Blockage, he is cursed with a shortened lifespan and the inability to collect internal energy. He had been peacefully spending the rest of his days indoors when he was ambushed by a group of masked people. During the ambush, he lost his servant who was like a sister to him. Chased by the attackers, Baek Yigang escaped through a secret underground path. When he came across a blocked path, he decided he’d at least die fighting and picked up a rusted sword that was stuck in the ground…

description.en:
Kahil Ruave, an unlucky duke who has no one by his side, charms all people of different ages with his demonic magic, and Lena is a maid who is unaffected by those charms. If the demonic charm from him was a scent, the room would've been flooded with a dizzying strong scent. However, Lena's eyes held no other emotion other than worry and fear. Kahil decided to use another route. His appearance was also seductive, and even though he suppressed his demonic charm, people still fell for him. Remembering that, Kahil smirked at Lena. This special treatment wasn't freely given to anyone, but... 

"S-save me, please..." Lena, who was barely holding her tears back, plead for her life over and over.

It was at that moment when his expression that would 'make even the gods swoon' faded, "You're not normal. You’re suspicious."

---
Duke Carhel Luave is known as the devilish duke due to his uncontrollable magical ability to charm every single person who lays their eyes on him. But this is more of a curse than a blessing with several noble houses plotting to drive him out of power. Having no one he can genuinely like or trust, Carhel wonders if he will ever be able to feel the warmth of another human being. One day, after raiding the estate of one of his enemies, Carhel mistakenly has Lena, the house’s maid, captured in the aftermath. But when he tries to use his charming powers to give her a painless death, something unexpected happens. For some reason, Carhel’s powers have no effect on Lena!

---

description.es:
Al duque Carhel Luave se lo conoce como el “duque demoníaco” debido a su incontrolable habilidad mágica para encantar a cualquier persona que lo mire a los ojos. Al ser una maldición más que una bendición, muchas casas nobles conspiran para derrocarlo. Y como no tiene a nadie de verdadera confianza, Carhel se pregunta si alguna vez podrá sentir el calor de otro ser humano. Un día, luego de atacar la finca de uno de sus enemigos, Carhel captura por error a Lena, la criada de la casa. Pero cuando intenta usar sus poderes para encantarla y que tenga una muerte rápida, ocurre algo inesperado. Por alguna razón, ¡los poderes de Carhel no tienen efecto en ella!

Duque Carhel Luave é conhecido como o duque diabólico devido à sua habilidade mágica incontrolável de encantar todas as pessoas que colocam seus olhos nele. Mas isso é mais uma maldição do que uma bênção, com várias casas nobres conspirando para tirá-lo do poder. Não tendo ninguém que ele possa realmente gostar ou confiar, Carhel se pergunta se ele será capaz de sentir o calor de outro ser humano. Um dia, depois de invadir a propriedade de um de seus inimigos, Carhel erroneamente prende Lena, a empregada da casa. Mas quando ele tenta usar seus poderes para dar a ela uma morte indolor, algo inesperado acontece. Por alguma razão, os poderes de Carhel não têm efeito sobre Lena!

description.en:
A man relaxing with a can of beer when a winter storm hits. A man, burdened with personal strife, finds solace in a bowl of ramen. 

A Silent Manga, each chapter is a self-contained glimpse into the life of an ordinary person, and how the meals they eat lift their spirits.

description.en:
In a universe ripped from the pages of a story, Siena Robert, a self-aware villainess, strives to rewrite her fate. Daughter of a man running a therianthrope shelter, she discovers Ivan Levdilin, the captivating male lead, detained within. Aware of her scripted demise when Ivan's father arrives for his rescue, Siena defies her villainous destiny. She showers Ivan with kindness, a stark contrast to the original Siena's cruel persona. Her actions shield Ivan from her father's cruelty and forge an unscripted bond between them that changes their destiny in an unforeseen direction. 

---
She possessed Sienna Lovett, the villain of the tragic novel. The greatest leader of the Tigers in the original novel when his Tiger Clan abandoned him for being a mutant, but that didn’t last long before the Duke came looking for his son. I’ve convinced my father to let him live with us somehow, but now I just need to succeed in protecting Ivan until the Duke comes… But when the Duke arrives, the unexpected happens. “I’ll take she too.” huh? I? Do I really want to continue living with my father?

Hana was never first. Always because Han Geon Woo came in first every time!
Hana would do anything to best Geon Woo, even though she can't figure him out.
This time, she tried to shock him by confessing...
He believed and accepted the confession though? 
Does he like me?

description.en:
Born as the successor of a low-ranking noble household, Raven Varte wears the sin of plotting a rebellion against the empire. To be granted amnesty, he was sent to fight demons alongside the worst corp of the empire, the ”Demon” corp. Most say that it is a place where most won’t survive for even a year, but Raven somehow managed to survive for ten. When his amnesty was in front of his eyes, on his last battlefield, he met the ‘Successor of the Pendragon Duke Household, Eren Pendragon.

description.ja:
下級貴族の次男として生まれたレイヴン・ヴァルトは反逆の汚名を着せられ、 赦免を見返りに最悪の部隊である"羅刹隊”で魔物と戦うことに。 大半は1年も生きることができないと言われる場所で、レイヴンは10年の歳月を生き延びた。 赦免を目前に控えたある日、最後の戦場でペンドラゴン公爵家の後継者であるエレン・ペンドラゴンと共に任務にあたるが…

---

- [Official Korean Translation](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58558135)
description.ko:
하급 귀족 가문의 차남으로 태어난 레이븐 발트.
반역에 연루되어 홀로 살아남은 그는
사면을 대가로 ‘악귀 부대’에서 싸우게 된다.

대부분이 1년을 버티지 못하는 곳에서
10년의 사면기간을 채울 때까지 살아남은 레이븐 발트.

사면을 목전에 둔 어느 날,
어려운 임무를 받고 팬드래건 공작가문의 후계자인
엘렌 팬드래건과 함께 임무에 투입되는데….

---
- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iRX266roHHM)

- [Official Korean Translation](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58558135)
description.ru:
Рэйвен Вальте, наследник малоизвестной аристократической семьи, обвиняется в бунтовщичестве против империи. У него есть выбор - ссылка, или смерть, и он выбирает ссылку. Его наказание - служба в войсках истребителей демонов, худшем военном подразделении в империи. Никто не верит, что Рейвен способен выжить там хотя бы год, но он приспосабливается и выживает до конца срока в десять лет. За несколько дней до амнистии он встречает на поле боя герцога Пендрагона, и происходит невероятное.

description.en:
An exhilarating romantic fantasy about a duke's daughter, a former prostitute, controlling the poison within evil!

The duke's daughter, Claudia, was supposed to be the fiancée of the crown prince, however her half-sister, Fermina's, schemes had her sold off to a brothel. She didn't want to end it like this, so she climbed to the top at the brothel, but ended up dying from an illness. Except, when she opened her eyes, the face of when she was a child looked back at her. Realizing she had gone back in time, Claudia wins over more and more supporters using the tactics she learnt during her days as a prostitute to prepare for her nearing conflict with Fermina.

"If Fermina is considered a villainess, I shall aim to become the ultimate villain!"
description.ja:
「あなたが悪女なら、それを超える"完璧な悪女"になってみせますわ! 」

王太子の婚約者だったはずが、異母妹・フェルミナの策略により娼館へと売られてしまった公爵令嬢・クラウディア。このまま終わるわけにはいかないという一心で娼館のナンバーワンに上りつめるも、病死してしまう。しかし、目が覚めると鏡には子供の頃の自分が! 過去へ逆行したクラウディアは、きたるべきフェルミナとの戦いに向けて、娼婦として身につけた手練手管で周りを次々と味方に引き込んでいく——。

---
[Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n6406gp/)

**Original Web Publication:** [Corona Comics](https://to-corona-ex.com/comics/49602840559659), [Nico Video](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/58462)
description.es-la: La hija del duque, Claudia, debía ser la prometida del príncipe heredero, sin embargo, los planes de su hermanastra, Fermina, hicieron que la vendieran a un burdel. Ella no quería terminar de esa manera, así que escaló a la cima del burdel, pero terminó muriendo de una enfermedad. Pero cuando abrió los ojos, la cara de una niña le devolvió la mirada. Al darse cuenta de que ha retrocedido en el tiempo, Claudia gana cada vez más adeptos utilizando las tácticas que aprendió durante sus días como prostituta para prepararse para su inminente conflicto con Fermina. "Si Fermina es considerada una villana, ¡yo aspiraré a convertirme en la villana perfecta!"

First story arc of the Jojo's Bizarre Adventure series.  
  
Jonathan Joestar, a young wealthy son living in Victorian England, has his life destroyed by a recently orphaned Dio Brando, who was taken in by Jonathan's father. Dio, who plots to drive Jonathan to insanity and inherit the Joestar fortune, becomes an unstoppable vampire that Jonathan must fight.

description.en: Wakana Gojou is a fifteen year old high-school boy who was socially traumatized in the past due to his passions. That incident left a mark on him that made him into a social recluse. Until one day he had an encounter with Kitagawa who is a sociable gyaru, who is the complete opposite of him. They soon share their passions with one another which leads to their odd relationship.
description.fr:
Wakana Gojo est un lycéen solitaire. Son rêve est de devenir artisan et de fabriquer les poupées traditionnelles pour le Hina Matsuri. Mais comme cette passion n’est pas très virile, il la cache et ne se fait pas remarquer. Jusqu’au jour ou Marine Kitagawa, la fille la plus populaire du lycée, le voit se servir d’une machine à coudre ! Contre toute attente elle lui demande de devenir son couturier pour réaliser… des tenues de cosplay !

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kana**
description.tr: Wakana Gojou, vadesi geçmiş tutkuları nedeniyle toplumsal travmaları olan 15 yaşında bir liselidir. Bu olayın bıraktığı iz onu toplumdan uzak biri haline getirdi. Bir gün kendisinin tam zıttı, arkadaş canlısı bir gal olan Kitagawa ile karşılaşır. Kısa zamanda garip ilişkilerini yönlendiren tutkularını paylaşırlar.
description.uk:
Вакана Ґоджьо — п’ятнадцятилітній учень старшої школи, в минулому отримав серйозну психологічну травму на фоні свого захоплення. Внаслідок чого хлопець ізолював себе від соціуму і почав вести затворницький образ життя.
Так було би і на далі, але в життя Ґоджьо буквально увірвалась Кітаґава — дружелюбна і комунікабельна дівчина, повна його протилежність. Досить швидко вони розділили хоббі один одного, що і привело до їх досить дивних, але міцних відносин.
description.vi: Wakana Gojou 15 tuổi là 1 học sinh cao trung từng bị tổn thương tâm lý trong quá khứ do sở thích kỳ lạ của mình. Chuyện đó đã khiến cậu trở nên nhút nhát, rụt rè. Cho tới ngày nọ Gojou tình cờ gặp Kitagawa – một Gyaru – người có tính cách trái ngược hoàn toàn với cậu ấy. 2 người họ hóa ra đều có những điểm chung và đã tạo thành một mối quan hệ hài hước
description.es-la: Wakana Gojou es un joven de quince años de edad que se vio traumatizado socialmente en el pasado debido a sus pasiones. Ese incidente le dejó una marca que lo convirtió en un recluso social. Hasta que un día tuvo un encuentro con Kitagawa, una gyaru sociable, que es todo lo contrario a él. Pronto comparten sus pasiones entre sí, lo que da lugar a su extraña relación.
description.pt-br: Wakana Gojou é um garoto de quinze anos que foi socialmente traumatizado no passado devido a suas paixões. Aquele incidente deixou uma marca nele que o fez ser um recluso social. Até que um dia ele teve um encontro com Kitagawa, que é um gyaru sociável, que é o completo oposto dele. Eles logo compartilham suas paixões uns com os outros, o que leva a um relacionamento estranho.

title.en: To Love Ru - Digital Colored Comics

description.en: Rito is a high-school boy who just can't confess to the girl of his dreams, Haruna-chan. One day when coming home and sulking in the bath-tub, a mysterious and barely clothed girl appears out of nowhere. Her name is Lala and she comes from another planet…
description.es-la: Yuuki Rito es el estudiante promedio de secundaria: torpe, tímido y desesperado cuando se trata de confesar sus sentimientos a la chica de sus sueños. ¡Pero un día, una princesa alienígena que huye aparece de repente en su bañera! Cuando Rito se compromete con la hermosa Lala después de un malentendido, se ve envuelto en el caos de la política extraterrestre, los pretendientes alienígenas rivales y la hilaridad del harén.

title.en: The Martial God who Regressed Back to Level 2

altTitles.en: The God of War Who Regressed to Level 2

altTitles.es-la: El dios marcial que regresó al nivel 2

description.en:
[NO. 4212: 'Humanity' has failed the Demotion Match.]
[NO. 4212: ‘Humanity’ has been deemed useless. Beginning deletion.]

Earth lost the fight for survival in the BattleNet system and humanity now faces eradication. However, Jihan Seong is given another chance. He has returned three years into the past before BattleNet became a life-or-death game.

With his knowledge of the future, he’s determined to become the strongest player. Will Jihan be able to change the fate of humanity? And more importantly, can he protect the ones he loves from those who want him to fail?

altTitles.th: สุขาวดีอเวจี

description.en:
Gabimaru the Empty, a former ninja assassin feared as a heartless husk of a man, spends his days on death row wondering when an executioner skilled enough to so much as harm him will arrive, as he thinks nothing of seeing an end to his meaningless existence… Or so he thought. 
Then the lady executioner, Asaemon the Beheader, rekindles his hope with an astounding proposition. 
If he ever wishes to see his beloved wife again, he must embark under the auspices of the shogunate on a perilous voyage to the mysterious mystic island said to house the elixir of immortality. 
Should he be the one among many rival death-row fiends and scoundrels to find the elixir, he'll earn a full exoneration, and, more importantly, a chance at an ordinary married life with the light of his life: the woman who made the world seem not so ugly. 
What awaits them is a journey like no other!
description.ru: Это случилось во времена правления одиннадцатого сёгуна из династии Токугава… Габимару, некогда сильнейший синоби, собиравшийся покинуть свою деревню, захвачен в плен. Но Ямада Асаэмон, девушка-палач, предложила ему прощение и свободу с одним условием… Он должен заполучить в райских землях эликсир бессмертия!.. Романтические приключения и искусство ниндзюцу от Каку Юдзи.
description.pt-br: Gabimaru, o Vazio, é um dos ninjas assassinos mais cruéis que já saiu da vila de Iwagakure. Ele é implacavelmente eficiente, mas uma traição resulta em uma sentença de morte. Só há uma esperança para ter sua liberdade: viajar para uma ilha escondida e conseguir um elixir, que tornará o shogun imortal. O fracasso não é uma opção, nesta ilha, o Céu e o Inferno estão a um metro de distância.

altTitles.vi: Sachiroku - Cuốn Sách Khải Huyền Của Sachi

description.en: ‘Humanity’s Judgment’ — a process by which an angel and a demon meticulously pass judgment upon a human, and the final score determines the fate of mankind. But this time, the chosen subject is the incredibly mischievous 6-year-old elementary school student, Sachi Ueno?! Just how will the unconventional living arrangement of an angel, a demon, and a human shape the future of humanity?

The Japan under-16 rugby team—nicknamed the Perfect Squad—shattered the power balance of high school rugby after sweeping the world cup. With so many former Perfect Squad members in their home prefecture, Rikuzen High’s rugby team has given up all hope of victory and now takes a laid-back approach to training. Enter transfer student and rugby novice Kinzan Yamada. He may be new, but he’s ready for the world of rugby. The question is whether they’re ready for him...

A man dies a mysterious death just outside Shinjuku Station. Eight years later, his son, Yodomi Arakawa, is leading a tranquil life until he meets…an invisible man?! And to learn the truth behind his father's death, Yodomi will have to become invisible himself...

Nekokado is an extremely straight-laced high school teacher who has lived alone since the death of his sister. But one day, he discovers a photo of her in a maid costume. He goes to a concept café in order to investigate his sister's secret, but there he meets a girl named Tsuruko…?!

(Source:MANGA Plus)
description.ja: 規則に厳格な堅物高校教師・猫門文蒋。ある日、彼は姉の遺した1枚のチェキをきっかけに、コンセプトカフェ「おとぎの國」へと迷い込む。そこで姉とのつながりを感じる新人メイド・鶴子と出会うが、彼女は猫門が担任する生徒でもあり…!?

altTitles.ja: ワイルドストロベリー

description.en: Plants have evolved. They can now feed on humans and become terrible monsters known as Jinka. Kingo and Kayano do their best to survive in a Tokyo overrun by plants, but when Kayano becomes a Jinka, Kingo will do anything he can to get her back!
Front-line stories of the Defense Force not covered in the main series!

altTitles.th: แด่เธอผู้เป็นนิรันดร์

description.en:
An immortal being was sent to the surface of the earth and met a boy living alone in the middle of tundra.   
The being can take the shape of dying things, but only if the "impetus" is stronger than the previous one. What sort of experiences and meetings will the being encounter while living forever?   

---   
- **Won the 43rd Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen in 2019** 
   
---

**Links:**  
**Officially Translated:**

description.fr:
"C'est à l'épreuve de la réalité que je saurai ce que je suis... Voilà pourquoi mon voyage commence."

Un être sous forme d'une petite sphère est envoyé sur terre, celle-ci change d'apparence en fonction de ce qu'elle rencontre.
Elle rencontre d'abord un loup puis un jeune garçon vivant seul au milieu d'un paysage enneigé. Chaque nouvelle rencontre est une occasion de vivre de nouvelles expérience pour cet être. Ainsi commence le voyage de l'Immortel, un voyage fait d'expériences et de rencontres dans un monde implacable...
description.ja: 『聲の形』の大今良時が贈る、永遠の旅。真っ白な魂で世界に降り立つ！──現実だけが自分が誰なのかを教えてくれる。だから僕は、旅に出る。
description.ru: Отправленное на землю бессмертное существо знакомится с мальчиком, одиноко живущим в Тундре. Существо может принимать форму умерших, но только если «импульс» сильнее предыдущего. С какими впечатлениями и встречами столкнётся существо, живущее вечно?
description.pt-br:
Um ser imortal foi enviado à superfície da terra e encontrou um menino que vivia sozinho no meio da tundra.
O ser pode assumir a forma de coisas moribundas, mas somente se o "ímpeto" for mais forte que o anterior. Que tipo de experiências e encontros o ser encontrará enquanto viver para sempre?

---
- **Ganhou o 43º Prêmio Kodansha Manga na categoria shounen em 2019**

description.en:
Upon a kingdom ravaged by war, descended a Dragon promising triumph and life eternal - a proposal accepted, a proposal respected, but one that would come at a severe price for the inhabitants.

Now the kingdom is in ruins. How come? It's for amnesiacs 'Missy' and Jess to find out.

______________

Devious Miss Crimson is a short story by RedbowCR (Crimson Ribbon: Summer Rain) aiming to provide a concise but complete narrative for the reader.

My second ever manga made as I gear up to tackle my next projects, I hope you will enjoy what this fun little story can provide to you, let's look forward to the future.

When the daughter of a shaman gets "strung up" with a centuries-old vampire, is it love or something more sinister that binds them? From Narae Lee, artist of the hit OEL manga ’Maximum Ride,’ comes the story of two misfits and their quirky, fantastical romp to find one another.
A Romcon With a Girl With a Dual Personality
description.ja: 二重人格女の子のラブコメ

description.en: Garaku, a city where murders occur frequently. A young man involved with the yakuza saw an old man resting with a katana on a bench.
description.pt-br: Garaku, uma cidade onde assassinatos ocerrem frequentemente. Um jovem envolvido com a yakuza viu um velho descançando num banco, com uma katana.

altTitles.es-la: El Dios de la Batalla de la Academia de Cazadores

description.en:
With an F-rank Trait, deemed the worst of the worst, 5-year-old Shin Yu-sung is abandoned by the Shin-oh family, which is famous for raising hunters.

The same year, he meets one of the strongest hunters, the Fist King, at the orphanage and is adopted by him. The Fist King became the strongest not through his Trait or special abilities — but by training his body.

He takes note of Shin Yu-sung's physique instead of his Trait — nine blocked yin pathways.

“Your blocked pathways cause your body’s mana to overflow, giving you an exceptional mind and god-like looks! But you also pass away before coming of age…”

An abundance of bodily yang.

“Your body is overflowing with the energy that can cure your nine blocked yin pathways!”

title.en: Kuzu Rouninsei, Jinsei ga Tsurai no de Yoru no Onee-san wo Yondemita

altTitles.ja: クズ浪人生、人生が辛いので夜のお姉さんを呼んでみた

altTitles.en: A Scummy Gap Student With a Hard Life Calls Upon a Lady of the Night
Failed University Exams, I am Trash and Life is Hard, so I Tried Calling an Onee-san at Night

description.en: Makino failed her college entrance exam. Her only comfort is in her 2D game characters... until she found an ad for a call-girl who looked exactly like her favorite in-game waifu! The yuri love comedy between a gullible young woman and a street-wise call-girl begins now!

title.en: Saikyou Rakudai Kizoku no Kenma Kiwameshi Antou Tan

altTitles.en: The Strongest Failed Aristocrat’s Dark Demon Sword

altTitles.ja: 最強落第貴族の剣魔極めし暗闘譚

altTitles.ja-ro: SAIKYOU RAKUDAI KIZOKU NO KENMA KIWAMESHI ANTANFU

description.en:
The sword saint and the sage are in fact the underdogs of the school! A "one-man, three-role" substandard (dark) fantasy!

Roy Revel is a frontier aristocrat from a lethargic small country. He is known as the "fallen aristocrat" at the school, but he has a secret. 

[The patron god of the land of swords, Cloud the White Sword Saint. 
The patron god of the land of magic, the great sage Eclipse the Black.]

The strongest and most admired of the two great powers is in fact Roy, who plays the role of an incompetent! In order to protect his family, Roy, the strongest nobleman who manipulates the fight against the Empire from the shadows, is interested in the beautiful girls at the academy who aspire to become sword saints and sages.

A new dark fantasy of the fallen aristocrat begins!

Staying alive is a new form of entertainment.
When Dokyung, disillusioned by the harshness of life, finally resolves to call it quits, a bored demon, Hwamyung, appears before her with a particular offer. Will Dokyung, having entered into a contract with the Demon of Disillusionment, be able to flip her disastrous life upside down?

title.en: Boku no Suki na Hito ga Suki na Hito

altTitles.ja: ぼくの好きな人が好きな人

altTitles.zh-hk: 我喜歡的人所喜歡的人

description.en: This story begins when the protagonist, a boy named Sora Akizuki, confesses his love to Miya Fuwa, a girl he has been in love with for a long time, and is rejected. When Sora learns that Miya likes someone else, he visits the dubious “Trialing Club," of which he is president, and tries to find out if he is the right person for her. The first episode shows the reality of the Trialing Club, whose activities one cannot imagine from its name, and the reason why its president, Suzukaze, created the club.
description.ru: Эта история начинается с того, что главный герой, мальчик по имени Сора Акидзуки, признается в любви Мие Фува, девушке, в которую он давно влюблен, и получает отказ. Когда Сора узнает, что Мия любит другого, он посещает сомнительный “Эксперементальный клуб”, президентом которого является этот незнакомец, и пытается выяснить, подходит ли он ей. В первом эпизоде показана реальность Эксперементального клуба, деятельность которого невозможно представить, исходя из его названия, и причина, по которой его президент Судзукадзе создал этот клуб.
description.vi:
Câu chuyện này bắt đầu khi nhân vật chính, một chàng trai tên Sora Akizuki, thú nhận tình yêu của mình với Miya Fuwa, một cô gái mà anh đã yêu từ lâu nhưng bị từ chối. Khi Sora biết rằng Miya thích một người khác, anh ấy đã đến thăm “Câu lạc bộ thử việc” đáng ngờ mà anh ấy là chủ tịch, và cố gắng tìm hiểu xem anh ấy có phải là người phù hợp với cô ấy không.
Tập đầu tiên cho thấy thực tế của Câu lạc bộ Thử nghiệm, những hoạt động mà người ta không thể tưởng tượng được từ cái tên của nó, và lý do tại sao chủ tịch của nó, Suzukaze, lại thành lập câu lạc bộ.
description.es-la: Está historia empieza cuando el protagonista, un chico llamado Sora Akizuki, confiesa su amor a Miya Fuwa, una chica de la que está enamorado desde hace tiempo, y es rechazado. Cuando Sora se entera de que a Miya le gusta otra persona, visita el dudoso "Club de Ensayos", del que es presidente, e intenta averiguar si es la persona adecuada para ella. El primer episodio muestra la realidad del Club de Ensayos, cuyas actividades no se puede imaginar por su nombre, y la razón por la que su presidente, Suzukaze, creó el club.

description.en:
A massive asteroid is about to hit earth!

Humanity has failed to stop a giant asteroid from plummeting into Earth, and life as we know it has ended. An ordinary Korean office worker named Cheolsu is somehow given the chance to go back in time and prevent this catastrophe from ever happening. Does he have a chance?

In a videogame based on a fantasy world, their players are know as Onmir. Our protagonist, a notorious killer of other Onmirs, logs in one day as usual but in the split of a moment, the environment changes giving a weird feeling, suddenly he realises that he cannot log off and that if he were to die, he will die in the real world. A fall into tragedy starts...
description.es-la: En un Juego basado en un mundo de fantasía, dentro de este los jugadores son conocidos como Onmir. Nuestro protagonista un infame Asesino de Onmirs, se conecta como siempre lo había hecho, pero en un momento el ambiente cambia, una sensación extraña y junto a esto él se percatada que no puede salir del juego. Si muere en el juego, morirá en la vida real. Se inicia un descenso a la tragedia...

altTitles.en: The Story About a Monster Teaching Common Sense

description.en:
Itou-san, who’s poor at interpersonal relations, was jealous of her mild-mannered classmate Takahashi-san, who gets along well with everyone. But one day, she witnesses Takahashi-san swallow a person whole. Takahashi-san was a monster mimicking a human!

Such a terrifying monster was calmly blending in with the class – that’s extremely admirable!! I definitely want to be her friend!!

And so Itou-san learns the “normality” of human society from Takahashi-san the monster. But while Itou-san is in high spirits, Takahashi-san has her own motives…

A tag team between a prodigy author and the spirited illustrator behind “Youjo Senki” brings forth a thundering tale of maidens whose youthful impatience and yearning jumble together and accelerate! (Translated from the Bookwalker description for Volume 1.)

altTitles.zh: 领主大人的金币用不完

altTitles.en: Does The Lord's Coin Not Shrink?!

altTitles.th: คอยน์เจ้าเมืองไม่ลดลงเลย?!

altTitles.ja: 領主様のコインは減らない!?

altTitles.es-la: El Dinero Del Señor No Disminuye

description.en:
Aaron Steelegard's fortune was basically set as he discovered a book that allowed him to trade across dimensions—until his enemies take both his life and his riches away. But Aaron is brought back as his younger self, armed with his past knowledge and a chance at revenge! Now free to amass coins, he's gaining powerful abilities and moving up the ranks of the interdimensional trading markets. Will Aaron gain enough coins to survive this journey of vengeance and reclaim his honor?

description.fr: Après avoir perdu toute la fortune de sa famille, un jeune seigneur devient la risée de tous. Pire encore, il tombe dans les mains de son pire ennemi et meurt des tortures qu'on lui a infligées. Au moment il perd connaissance, il se met à regretter toutes les erreurs qu’il a commises et qui l’ont conduite là où il en est… Et là, miracle ! Il se réveille 17 ans en arrière ! Son objectif : faire les bons choix, faire prospérer sa famille et surtout sa richesse et ce, grâce à l’aide d’un artefact magique, le livre de transactions interdimensionnelles !
description.ja:
誇り高きスティルガード家に生まれるも実力不足のまま領主になり、詐欺にあい全ての財産を失ってしまったエルン。暗殺者に死に追いやられるも気がつくと17年前に戻っていた！ 別の次元に住む者と物の取引が可能な家宝「次元取引書」 今度の人生ではなぜか自分の目に映るウィンドウで次元取引ができるようになっていた！？ 「同じ悲劇は繰り返さない」 前世での失敗をもとに怒涛の復讐劇をくり広げていく！

???: 영차고 나발이고 저희 다 그 놈한테 X된거 같습니다만.

차원거래계를 다 뒤집어놓으신 신예가 나타났다!

모든 거래자의 공공의 적, 에른 스틸가드.
사실 그는 차원거래로 모든 재산을 잃고 암살자에게 비참한 죽음을 당한 후, 과거로 회귀한 상태.

에른은 전생의 모든 기억을 가지고 중고로운 차원나라… 아니, 평화로운 차원나라에 폭풍을 몰고 오기 시작하는데…?

На рынке измерений, появился новичок, превосходящий любого!
Человек, в прошлой жизни Потерявший всё состояние, погибший от рук жалких наёмников и проигравший злейшему врагу...
Эрн Стилгард переродился!

Значит, моя книга измерений и все воспоминания остались со мной? Ну держитесь! Я переверну ваш рынок с ног на голову!

description.th:
เอิร์น สตีลการ์ด ชายหนุ่มที่ต้องพบเจอโศกนาฏกรรมอันน่าเศร้าในวัย 33 ปีจากการถูกหลอกลวงและหักหลัง ได้ย้อนเวลากลับไปยังตอนที่มีอายุเพียง 16 ปี ด้วยความน่าอัศจรรย์ของไอเทมที่ซื้อมาจากการเทรดข้ามมิติ

เขาจึงตั้งปณิธานว่าในชีวิตนี้จะไม่ยอมให้เกิดเรื่องแบบเดิมขึ้นอีก และเขาจะใช้การเทรดข้ามมิติที่มีคอยน์เป็นตัวชี้วัด สร้างอนาคตอันรุ่งโรจน์ให้ได้!
description.zh: 废柴领主艾伦没钱没能力，唯一的武器就是一本书——次元交易书。 在即将被人残忍杀害之际，他凭借“愿望书签”实现了临终愿望，重生回到了过去，而此时的他发现，次元交易书出现在了他意想不到的地方……

title.en: Hajime no Ippo - The First Step

altTitles.th: ก้าวแรกสู่สังเวียน

description.en:
Makunouchi Ippo is an ordinary high school student in Japan. Since he spends most of his time away from school helping his mother run the family business, he doesn't get to enjoy his younger years like most teenagers. Always a target for bullying at school, Ippo's life is one of hardship. One of these after-school bullying sessions turns Ippo's life around for the better, as he is saved by a boxer named Takamura. He decides to follow in Takamura's footsteps and train to become a boxer, giving his life direction and purpose. Ippo's path to perfecting his pugilistic prowess is just beginning.

Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Level Comics as **Fight!! Ippo** (2006-ongoing)
description.pt-br: Ippo Makunouchi, um tímido estudante de ensino médio, é um dia salvo se der espancado, por Takamura, um boxeador. Encantado pelas habilidade de Takamura e por vídeos de boxe, Ippo decide enfrentar o mundo profissional do boxe!

description.en:
Lim Sejun, who likes to eat, is fat and has a large physique. He has high self-esteem and a firm personality that doesn't even care about being teased for being fat. He has only one friend, 'Seo Hajin'. She has always been learning Jiujitsu to protect Sejun since childhood. 

One day, Sejun has trouble with a delinquent in the same class, and Hajin sees it and destroys that delinquent. But one night, Hajin is found severely beaten and suffers from a badly injured knee and more serious psychological trauma. Sejun tries to tell the police, but when the investigation doesn't make much progress, he can't control his anger and goes to find the culprit himself, but he's defeated by the delinquent who learned Jiujitsu and finds nothing. Then he learns Jiujitsu from a man named 'Jason' who saved him. 

Three months later, Sejun, who learned Jiujitsu and lost weight, finds out that a veiled group is involved, and wants to destroy it. A school action drama depicting individual revenge.
description.ko:
평소 먹는 것을 좋아해 뚱뚱하고 큰 체격을 가진 '임세준'.
그는 뚱보라는 놀림에도 신경 쓰지 않는
자존감이 높고 확고한 성격을 가졌다.

그에게 단 한 명의 친구 '서하진'.
그녀는 어릴 적부터 세준을 지켜주기 위해 늘 운동을 배워왔다.

어느 날 세준은 같은 반 일진과 트러블이 생기고
그것을 본 하진은 눈이 돌아가 일진을 박살 내게 된다.

그런데 어느 날 밤 하진은 심하게 폭행당한 채로 발견되고
크게 다친 무릎과 더 심각한 정신적 후유증을 얻는다.

세준은 경찰에게 말해보지만 수사에 별 진척이 없자
분노를 주체하지 못하고 직접 범인을 찾아 나서지만
주짓수를 배운 일진에게 패배하고 아무것도 알아내지 못한다.

그리곤 그를 구해준 '제이슨'이라는 사람에게
주짓수를 배우게 되는데, 
그렇게 3개월, 운동을 배우고 살을 뺀 세준은 일진들을 쓰러뜨려가며 
베일에 싸인 한 단체가 연루되어있다는 사실을 알게 되고,
그 뿌리까지 모조리 뽑아버리려 한다.

개인의 복수를 그리는 학원 액션 드라마.
description.ru:
Лим Се Джун, обладающий крупным телосложением, толстяк, обожающий вкусно поесть. У него высокая самооценка и твердый характер, и его не волнует, что его дразнят и обзывают толстяком. У него есть только один друг - Со Ха Джин. С самого детства она изучает джиу-джитсу, чтобы защитить Се Джуна. Однажды Ха Джин увидела, что у него проблемы с одним из одноклассников, и побила его. 
А дальше... Вы узнаете, прочитав данное произведение.

title.en: Watashi Yori Tsuyoi Otoko to Kekkon Shitai no

altTitles.ja: 私より強い男と結婚したいの

altTitles.en: I Want to Marry a Man Stronger Than Me!

description.en: Akira Kogure, an introverted loner high-school student befriends the student council president Shizuka Takasaki, who excels in both academics and athletics, blessed with beautiful looks from birth. Though their relationship may seem to be normal, both are keeping a secret that they can't reveal to anyone?!

Kisshouin Tsubaki aka the "Crimson Camellia" wants to satisfy her occultistic curiosity by having a hands-on experience with every Yokai she can find.  Let's follow her in her travels, accompanied by her trusted cameraman Yokomizo-kun.
description.es:
Kisshouin Tsubaki alias la "Camelia Carmesí", una bella reportera de lo oculto, quiere satisfacer su curiosidad intelectual teniendo una experiencia práctica con cada Yokai que pueda encontrar.  
Sígala en sus viajes, acompañada por su confiable camarógrafo Yokomizo-kun.

description.en: A sweet, savage, action romance between a gangster and a vampire girl…! Jung Chung-Oh, he is a tyrant that wipes out the entire enemy all by himself. One day, he gets assigned to protect a girl. Baek I-Do, she is the girl that is protected by the chairman of the TaeReam group. She was – “I’m more into being a predator, than being a prey.” – A vampire. “I’m pleased to meet you. My name is Jung Chung-Oh.” Will Ido happen to be a saviour, or hell to Jung Chung-Oh, who is trying to stay alive for a bloodthirsty revenge.

description.ar:
هنا ، داخل رواية فنون الدفاع عن النفس هذه ، يوجد معلم حقيقي يعلم البطل المتعجرف وينقذه من الموت.
 وسيم وطيب وصالح وقوي و ...
 على أي حال ، كان هناك عيب كبير في معلم البطل وهو ابنته الوحيدة الحمقاء المليئة بالجشع... كانت شريرة اضافية ، كانت تطارد البطل دوما ولكنه لم يستطع التخلي عنها لانها ابنه معلمه.
 خلال قراءة الرواية ، قمت بلعن تلك الابنة وقلت أنه لو كنت أنا ، فلن أعيش هكذا.
 "لكن هذا لا يعني أنني أريد أن أكون هي!"
 ما هو أسوأ ان أبي مات بالفعل ، وسمعتي هي الأسوأ.
 هربت حتما ، لكن ... مت، لكن عندما فتحت عيني كان أبي حياً؟!
 "إذا كان الأمر كذلك ، في هذه الحياة ، سانقذ أبي بالتأكيد!"
 لكن…
 "أعتقد أنهم يستهدفون حفيدتي !؟ سأقتلهم جميعًا! "
 لماذا أرى جدي ، الذي لم يظهر سوى مرات قليلة في الرواية يتصرف هكذا؟
 "زواج؟ لا ، قالت يوني إنها ستعيش بجانبي لبقية حياتها ".
 حتى أبي ، بطريقة ما أصبح غريبًا.
 علاوة على ذلك،
 "لماذا تستمر في تفاديني؟ هل هذا خطأي أيضًا؟ "
 أليست الشخصية الرئيسية فجأة مهووسة بي؟
 في الأصل ، كان مقدرا لي أن أموت حتى أتيت إلى هنا ".
 لقد أنقذت ذلك الوغد ، لكن اليس العمل الصالح دوما يمر دون عقاب؟
 "على الأقل عندما أكون أمامك ... لا أعتقد أنني شخص رائع."
 الشرير الذي قطع عنقي يحاول فجأة التوبة.
 هل من المقبول حقًا أن يصبح الأمر هكذا؟

description.en:
Yeon was just an orphan on the streets when a man claiming to be her father brought her to his family home. But the Baengri estate was a den of vipers that swallowed her whole, and it's only when she's standing at the funeral of the father she never truly understood that she realizes how familiar this story is. When she wakes up six years old again, Yeon knows she can't waste her second chance. This time, she's going to save her father. This time, she's going to live without regrets.

---
Here, inside this martial arts novel, there is a true teacher who teaches the arrogant male lead and awakens him through death. Handsome, good-natured, righteous, strong, and… Anyway, there was one big flaw in the male lead's damn fine teacher. It was his foolish only daughter who was filled with greed. A tenacious villainous extra, who always comes back to haunt the male lead in every way, but cannot be abandoned because she is his teacher's daughter. Throughout reading the novel, I cursed at that daughter. Saying that if it were me, I wouldn't live like that.

'But that didn't mean that I wanted to be her!'

What was worse, Father has already died, and my reputation was the worst. Inevitably, I ran away, but… I died. However, when I opened my eyes, Father was alive?!

'If so, in this life, I will definitely save Father!'

However…

"To think they’re aiming for my granddaughter?! I'll kill them all!"

Why do I see Grandfather, who doesn't even appear many times throughout the novel, so often like this?

"Marriage? No. Yeonie said that she would live by my side for the rest of her life."

Even Father, somehow became weird. Moreover:

"Why do you keep avoiding me? Is this also my mistake?"

Isn't the main character suddenly becoming obsessed with me?

"Originally, I was destined to die. Until you came here."

I saved the time-limited bastard, but isn’t it that no good deed goes unpunished?

"At least when I'm in front of you… I don't think I’m trash."

The villain who blew off my neck is suddenly trying to repent.

Is it really okay if it's like this?

---

description.es:
¡La protagonista transmigró a un mundo de una novela de artes marciales! La protagonista transmigra al cuerpo de Baeklee Yeon, la tonta y detestable hija de Baeklee Ee-Gang, un ser perfecto y el maestro del protagonista masculino, quien lo guía hacia el camino de un héroe. Ella fue asesinada inesperadamente, pero cuando abrió los ojos descubrió que había regresado a su infancia donde podría enmendar todos sus errores. “¿Podré ser amada esta vez?” En esta vida, con la determinación de convertirse en la hija perfecta, en lugar de un fastidio, ella pasa de ser la nieta despreciada a la nieta amada de la familia Baeklee. “¡¿Crees que lo vales?!” “¡Sí!” Incapaz de ocultar su confusión ante el vigor de su ambiciosa nieta… “Si hay incluso una pequeña esperanza, ¿Cómo puedo, como padre, rendirme?” “…Es como hablarle a la pared.” Su abuelo secretamente abre su corazón después de ser arrollado por el dúo de atractivos padre e hija, resueltos a salvar a la incapacitada hija que no puede practicar artes marciales, aunque eso significara recibir su odio. ¡Y justo cuando su vida merecía ser vivida, ¿la obsesión de los candidatos a protagonistas masculinos hacia ella, empezó de repente?! ¡Yeon, sólo caminemos por el sendero de flores de ahora en adelante!

---
Aquí, dentro de esta novela de artes marciales, hay un verdadero maestro que enseña al arrogante protagonista masculino y lo despierta a través de la muerte. Guapo, bondadoso, recto, fuerte y... De todos modos, había un gran defecto en el excelente profesor del protagonista masculino. Era su tonta única hija la que estaba llena de codicia. Una villana extra tenaz, que siempre regresa para perseguir al protagonista masculino en todos los sentidos, pero no puede ser abandonada porque es la hija de su maestro. Mientras leía la novela, maldije a esa hija. Diciendo que si fuera yo, no viviría así. '¡Pero eso no significaba que yo quisiera ser ella!' Lo que era peor, Padre ya murió, y mi reputación es la peor. Inevitablemente, me escapé, pero... morí. Sin embargo, cuando abrí los ojos, ¿¡Padre estaba vivo!? '¡Si es así, en esta vida, definitivamente salvaré a Padre!' Sin embargo… “¿¡Pensar que están apuntando a mi nieta!? ¡Los mataré a todos!” ¿Por qué veo al abuelo, que ni siquiera aparece muchas veces a lo largo de la novela, tan a menudo así? "¿Casamiento? No. Yeonie dijo que viviría a mi lado por el resto de su vida”. Incluso Padre, de alguna manera se volvió raro. Además, “¿Por qué sigues evitándome? ¿Es este también mi error? ¿No se está obsesionando el personaje principal de repente conmigo? “Originalmente, estaba destinado a morir. Hasta que llegaste aquí. Salvé al bastardo de tiempo limitado, pero ¿no es que ninguna buena acción queda sin castigo? "Al menos cuando estoy frente a ti... no creo que sea una basura". El villano que me voló el cuello de repente está tratando de arrepentirse. ¿Está realmente bien si es así?

description.fr:
Dans ce roman d'arts martiaux, il y a un professeur qui enseigne à l’arrogant protagoniste et le sauve de la mort. Une belle apparence, intelligent, fort… Quoi qu'il en soit, ce professeur avait un point faible. Il s'agit de sa fille unique, stupide et remplie de cupidité. Une antagoniste tenace, qui ne fait qu’embêter le rôle principal masculin de toutes sortes de manières, mais ne peut être abandonnée car elle est la fille de son professeur. Tout au long de la lecture du roman, j'ai maudit cette fille. Dire que si c'était moi, je ne vivrais pas comme ça.

«Mais ça ne voulait pas dire que je voulais être elle!»

Et le pire arriva, la mort de mon père. Évidemment, je me suis enfuie, mais… J'ai été assassinée. Puis, quand j'ai ouvert les yeux, Père était en vie?!

«Cette fois-ci, dans cette vie, je sauverai père!»

Cependant…

«Comment osent-ils s'en prendre à ma petite-fille?! Je vais tous les tuer!»

Pourquoi est-ce que je croise grand-père, qui n'apparaît pas souvent dans le roman, aussi fréquemment?

«Un mariage? Non. Yeonie a dit qu'elle vivrait à mes côtés pour le restant de sa vie.»

Même Père, d'une manière ou d'une autre, est devenu bizarre.

De plus, «Pourquoi continuez-vous à m'éviter? Ai-je fait une erreur?»

Le personnage principal n'est-il pas soudainement en train de devenir obsédé par moi?

«À l'origine, j'étais destiné à mourir. Jusqu'à ce que tu viennes ici.»

J'ai sauvé ce bâtard limité dans le temps, mais n'est-ce pas qu'aucune bonne action ne reste impunie?

«Au moins quand je suis devant toi… je ne me sens pas comme une ordure.»

Le méchant qui m'a tuée essaie soudainement de se repentir.

Est-ce une bonne chose?

---

description.ru:
Здесь, внутри этого романа о боевых искусствах, есть учитель, который учит надменного мужского героя и пробуждает его силу. Красивый, добродушный, праведный, сильный и… К сожалению, у чертовски прекрасного учителя главного героя был один большой недостаток. Это была его глупая дочь, вдоволь наполненная жадностью. Стойкая статистка-злодейка, которая всегда возвращается, чтобы преследовать главного героя, но ее нельзя бросить, потому что она дочь учителя. На протяжении всего романа я проклинала эту дочь. Сказать честно, что если бы этой дочерью была я, то не допустила бы подобного. 

—Но это не значит, что я хотела быть ею!

Что еще хуже, отец уже умер, а моя репутация была ужасной. 

Я сбежала, но… я умерла. Однако, когда я открыл глаза, отец все ещё был жив!?

«Если так, то в этой жизни я обязательно спасу отца!»

Однако…

—Подумать только, они целятся в мою внучку!? Я убью их всех!

Почему я так часто вижу дедушку, который появлялся в романе от силы пару раз? 

—Брак? Нет. Ёни сказала, что будет жить рядом со мной до конца своей жизни. 

Даже отец стал вести себя как-то странно.

Более того:
—Почему ты продолжаешь меня избегать? Это тоже моя ошибка?

Почему главной герой внезапно стал так одержим мной? 

—До твоего прихода мне было суждено умереть

Я спасла временного ублюдка, но ведь ни одно доброе дело не остается безнаказанным?

—По крайней мере, когда я стою перед тобой…

Злодей, снесший мне шею, вдруг пытается раскаяться.

Все будет хорошо, так ведь?

description.tr:
Ana karakter; dövüş sanatları dünyasında başrolü, hikâyenin kahramanı yapacak olan güçlü ve eğitimini tamamlamış usta Baek Lee Ee-Gang’ın aptal ve sinir bozucu kızı Baek Lee Yeon olarak hayat bulur. Yeon, beklenmedik şekilde öldürülür ve gözlerini açtığında her şeyi geri alabileceği çocukluk günlerine geri döner. “Bu hayatımda ailem beni sevecek mi?” Baş belası olmak yerine harika bir evlat olmaya karar veren Yeon, Baek Lee ailesinin saygın torunu olarak hayatına başlar. Bu hayatını güzelce yaşamak ister ancak ailenin başı olan büyükbabası Baek Lee Pan-Hyuk da dahil olmak üzere herkes Yeon’a engel olur. Büyükbabasının bakışları o kadar serttir ki dağları ve nehirleri bile titretebilir. “O kadar değerli olduğunu mu sanıyorsun?”
“Evet.”
Büyükbaba, kendine güvenen torunu karşısında şaşkına döner ve oğluyla torununu gizlice izlemeye başlar.
“Çok az umut olsa da baba olarak nasıl hemen pes edebilirsin?”
“Amma inatçısın he.”
Yakışıklı oğlu, dövüş sanatları dünyasının yüz karası kızını o karanlıktan kurtarmaya ve herkesi karşısına almaya hazırdır. Yeon, tam hayatının artık daha güzel olacağını düşünürken erkek başroller bir bir ona takıntılı olmaya başlar!
“Yeonie’m, bu sefer hayatımız gerçekten çok güzel olacak!!”

description.vi:
Cô xuyên không trở thành một nhân vật chính trong thế giới võ lâm. Cô trở thành BaekRi Yeon, đứa con gái ngốc nghếch và quậy phá của BaekRi Eui Kang, một người thầy chân chính và là người đã dẫn dắt nhân vật nam chính trở thành một anh hùng. Sau khi bất ngờ bị giết, cô mở mắt ra và trở thành một đứa trẻ có thể làm đảo ngược mọi thứ. ‘Mình, lần này có thể nhận được sự yêu thương không?” Ở kiếp này, cô có niềm tin rằng mình sẽ trở thành con gái được yêu thương chứ không phải đứa con gái chịu nhiều tổn thương nữa, cô bắt đầu cuộc sống được mọi người kính trọng từ cháu gái của gia đình Baekri. Những gia tộc cản trở xuất hiện trước mặt Yeon, người chỉ muốn đi trên con đường rải đẩy hoa, và Baek Ri Pae-hyeok, là tộc trưởng và cũng là ông nội của cô, ông sở hữu khí phách của một vị vua, người có thể khiến cả núi sông và cây cối rung chuyển chỉ bằng một ánh mắt. “Ngươi cho rằng ngươi đáng giá như thế sao!” “Vâng!” Ông không thể che giấu sự hốt hoảng trước khí thế mạnh mẽ của cháu gái “Nếu còn một tia hy vọng mong manh, người làm cha sao con có thể từ bỏ?” “…Như là một đứa trẻ cứng đầu.” Ông lão bắt đầu mềm lòng vì hai cha con tuyệt mỹ đánh bại với quyết tâm sẽ cứu đứa cháu gái không có tài nghệ võ công … Tôi nghĩ rằng được sống ở thời điểm này là xứng đáng, nhưng nỗi ám ảnh của các ứng cử viên nam chính đột nhiên bắt đầu? Yeoni của chúng ta, bây giờ hãy chỉ đi trên con đường hoa thôi nhé!

description.pt-br:
Aqui, dentro desta novel de artes marciais, há um professor que ensina o protagonista arrogante e o desperta através de sua morte. Bonito, agradável, justo, forte e… enfim, só havia uma grande falha no professor do protagonista, que era sua filha única insensata, a qual era cheia de ambição. Uma persistente vilã extra que sempre assombra o protagonista de todas as formas, mas nunca pode ser abandonada por ser a filha do professor. Enquanto eu lia o romance, amaldiçoei-a, dizendo que, se eu fosse ela, não viveria daquela forma. Mas isso não significava que eu queria ser ela! Pior ainda, o pai já havia morrido e minha reputação era a pior. Inevitavelmente, eu fugi, mas… morri. No entanto, quando abri meus olhos, meu pai estava vivo?! “Já que é assim, nesta vida, vou definitivamente salvar meu pai! Entretanto… “Eles estão visando minha neta?! Vou matar todos eles” Por que vejo o meu avô, que sequer aparece muitas vezes na novel, com tanta frequência assim? “Casamento? Não. Yeon disse que viveria ao meu lado pelo resto da vida dela.” Mesmo meu pai se tornou estranho. Além disso, “Por que você continua me evitando? Cometi algum erro?”, o protagonista por um acaso está se tornando obcecado por mim? “Originalmente, eu estava destinado à morte. Até você chegar aqui.” Eu salvei o idiota que tinha os dias contados, mas não dizem que somos recompensados por nossas boas ações? “Pelo menos, quando estou à sua frente… não penso que sou um lix@.” De repente, o vilão responsável por minha morte está parecendo arrependido. Está mesmo tudo bem que as coisas sejam assim?

description.en:
I can't believe my ojou-sama is so huge!  
  
Fujido Oriko is the buxom young head of the Fujido Zaibatsu, a group that has a monopoly on Japan's vending machine industry. And serving at her side is her personal butler, the eccentric Dr. Sebastion.  
  
When a monster suddenly attacks the city, Dr. Sebastion slips his ojou-sama an experimental energy drink his team in R&D has been developing. As a result, she quickly finds herself growing into a giantess, matching the attacking kaiju in size! Will she be able to stop his rampage, or at the very least, keep her dignity intact?  
  
*[The pre-serialization version was the winner of Shounen Jump's Dec 2020 Bronze Rookie Award. The current serialization is on Sunday Web Every.]*
